casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Lee RISHER. No. 595P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 22, 2006. Matthew G. Pruden, for Risher. Kelly L. Sandling, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*447The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of November 2006 by Defendant to Stay Mandate Pending Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of November 2006."
